item.title: Game Jam Projects
item.description: While I was a student at Penn State University, I was an officer in the Game Development Club and facilitated several weekend game jam events where students would build games based on a theme. Here are the games I created during these events using Slick2D for Java. Look Beyond Look Beyond is the game I submitted for the 2014 Global Game Jam based on the theme: “We don’t see things as they are, we see them as we are.

item.title: Nonogram Solver
item.description: This is a basic web UI built in Kotlin/JS to demonstrate the nonogram solver I built as a Kotlin multiplatform library. Check out the GitHub Repository here. You must have JavaScript enabled to use this application
